thread.title: A Ukrainian doctor chooses to stay in embattled Kherson | Focus on Europe
thread.title_full: A Ukrainian doctor chooses to stay in embattled Kherson | Focus on Europe

title: A Ukrainian doctor chooses to stay in embattled Kherson | Focus on Europe
text: Oleksandr Chebotaryov is the only radiologist left in Kherson. All of his colleagues have fled the city in this embattled region of Ukraine.
